name: SkyGiraffe Software Ltd.
description: Developer of an enterprise-grade mobility platform designed to mobilize line-of-business applications. The company's platform helps businesses to deploy enterprise-grade mobile applications on any device immediately and without the need for writing code, enabling employees to read and write-back data through customized mobile business applications.
one_liner: Developer of an enterprise-grade mobility platform designed to mobilize line-of-business applications. The company's platform helps businesses to deploy enterprise-grade mobile applications on any device immediately and without the need for writing code, enabling employees to read and write-back data through customized mobile business applications.
